id.description: Unique identifier for the success data entry.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the success data was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the success data was last updated.

success_window_started_at.description: Timestamp when the success window started for tracking.

user.description: Details of the user associated with the successful action.

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to the user associated.

person.description: Details of the person associated with the successful action.

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to the person associated.

latest_email.description: Details of the latest successful email sent.

id.description: Unique identifier for the latest successful email.

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to the latest successful email.

latest_call.description: Details of the latest successful phone call made.

id.description: Unique identifier for the latest successful phone call.

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to the latest successful phone call.

latest_action.description: Details of the latest successful action taken.

id.description: Unique identifier for the latest successful action.

latest_cadence.description: Details of the latest successful cadence.

id.description: Unique identifier for the latest successful cadence.

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to the latest successful cadence.

latest_step.description: Details of the latest successful step in the process.

id.description: Unique identifier for the latest successful step.

_href.description: Hyperlink reference to the latest successful step.

counts.description: Total count of various successful actions.

total_emails.description: Total number of successful emails sent.

total_calls.description: Total number of successful phone calls.

total_other_touches.description: Total number of other successful touches.
